title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund Bitcoin exposure not ‘intentional’
contents: If the fund was aiming to increase its Bitcoin exposure, there would be more “evidence of direct exposure initiatives,” according to an analyst.
author: byCiaran Lyons

title: US Marshals likely selling Silk Road Bitcoin, says lawyer
contents: The lawyer’s claims spark questions about market stability amid the potential sale of Silk Road Bitcoin by the US Marshals.
author: byAmaka Nwaokocha

title: Bitcoin $59K price may swing ‘drastically’ amid election year parallels
contents: If Bitcoin follows the same pattern as previous election years, August will be “nothing crazy,” but a breakout may occur within a month or two, according to a crypto analyst.
author: byCiaran Lyons

title: Advisor holdings in Bitcoin ETFs rise, hedge fund stakes dip — Coinbase
contents: Investment advisors are expanding their spot Bitcoin ETF holdings, but Coinbase warns that "large inflows" might not be seen immediately due to the slow summer period in the United States.
author: byCiaran Lyons

title: Franklin Templeton files S-1 for new crypto index ETF
contents: Issuers are lining up for the next wave of cryptocurrency exchange-trade funds.
author: byAlex O’Donnell

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contents: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.
author: byCointelegraph

title: Crypto VC funding hits $2.7B in Q2, Tron may be ‘most profitable blockchain’ — Finance Redefined
contents: Crypto startup funding rose over 2.5% in Q2, and Tron could be on track to become the most profitable blockchain in terms of revenue, according to Justin Sun.
author: byZoltan Vardai

title: Texas senator discloses up to $100K in BTC after blockchain endorsement
contents: After visiting a Bitcoin mining facility and receiving the endorsement of a blockchain advocacy group, Senator Ted Cruz reported purchasing up to $100,000 worth of BTC in 2023.
author: byTurner Wright

title: Price analysis 8/16: BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL, XRP, DOGE, TON, ADA, AVAX, SHIB
contents: Bitcoin bulls are holding on to the $55,500 support, but an increase in futures open interest and a death cross on the BTC chart have traders worried that further downside is in store.
author: byRakesh Upadhyay

title: Goldman Sachs, Capula, Avenir were biggest BTC ETF buyers in Q2 — CoinShares
contents: The companies collectively purchased nearly $1.3 billion worth of Bitcoin ETF shares during the quarter.
author: byAlex O’Donnell

title: NYSE, Nasdaq withdraw 3 more requests for crypto ETF options rule changes
contents: Activity keeps heating up around Bitcoin and Ether ETF options.
author: byAlex O’Donnell

title: Is Bitcoin price going to crash again?
contents: Most long-term Bitcoin holders are currently in a profitable position, which heightens the likelihood of profit-taking and sending BTC prices lower.
author: byYashu Gola

title: Bitcoin price stumbles as gold price hits $2.5K for the first time ever
contents: Bitcoin could hardly look less like gold as sideways BTC price moves meet all-time highs.
author: byWilliam Suberg

title: Bitcoin is back in ‘accumulation’ — What does it mean for BTC price?
contents: Bitcoin could stage a recovery above $66,000 by September but faces significant resistance around $61,700.
author: byZoltan Vardai

title: Bitdeer to expand operations with $150M convertible notes offering
contents: Bitdeer Technologies Group’s stock price dropped to $6.33 after it announced a senior convertible notes offering.
author: byEzra Reguerra
